question: 81. Every object in S3 has a . (Choose two.)
82. Which of the following is the best approach to ensuring that objects in your S3 buckets are not accidentally deleted?
options: D. All of these options are equally useful.
C. Enabling MFA Delete on buckets
answers: C. Enabling MFA Delete on buckets

question: 83. What HTTP request header is used by MFA Delete requests?
84. Which of the following operations will take advantage of MFA Delete, if it is enabled? (Choose two.)
options: B. Changing the versioning state of a bucket
C. Permanently deleting an object version
answers: B. Changing the versioning state of a bucket
C. Permanently deleting an object version

question: 85. When using an MFA Delete–enabled bucket to delete an object, from where does the authentication code come?
options: A. A hardware or virtual MFA device
B. The token section of the AWS console
C. The AWS REST API under delete-codes in a bucket’s metadata
answers: A. A hardware or virtual MFA device

question: 86. Who can enable MFA Delete on an S3 bucket?
options: B. All authorized IAM users that can update the bucket
A. All authorized IAM users of the bucket
D. The root account that owns the bucket
answers: D. The root account that owns the bucket

question: 87. Who can enable versioning on an S3 bucket?
options: D. The root account that owns the bucket
A. All authorized IAM users of the bucket

question: 88. Which of the following exist and are attached to an object stored in S3? (Choose two.)
89. Which of the following is the AWS mechanism for adding object metadata using the AWS console?
90. Which of the following is the exception to S3 storing all versions of an object?
options: A. When an object is deleted via MFA Delete
C. When an object’s current version is deleted
B. When all of the versions of an object are deleted

question: 91. You have an S3 bucket with versioning enabled. How can you turn off versioning?
options: B. Versioning can only be turned off through the AWS CLI or API. Use your application keys to change versioning to “off” on the bucket.
A. Update the bucket properties in the AWS console and turn off versioning.
D. You can’t turn off versioning once it has been enabled.
C. Send a message to the S3 bucket using the HTML request header x-amz-versioning and the value of “off.”
answers: D. You can’t turn off versioning once it has been enabled.

question: 92. CloudFront is a web service for distributing what type of content? (Choose two.)
options: C. Script-generated or programmatically generated dynamic content
answers: C. Script-generated or programmatically generated dynamic content

question: 93. What are the sources of information that CloudFront serves data from called?
94. Which of the following are typical origin servers for a CloudFront distribution? (Choose two.)
95. Which of the following are not origin servers for a CloudFront distribution? (Choose two.)
options: A. Docker containers running on ECS

question: 96. What is the location where content will be cached in a CloudFront distribution called?
97. Which of the following are not origin servers for a CloudFront distribution? (Choose two.)
98. What is a collection of edge locations called?
99. Rank the total number of regions, availability zones, and edge locations in order from the least number to the greatest number.
options: B. Regions < availability zones < edge locations
D. Edge locations < availability zones < regions
C. Edge locations < regions < availability zones
A. Availability zones < regions < edge locations
answers: B. Regions < availability zones < edge locations

question: 100. Which of the following statements are true? (Choose two.)
options: C. There are fewer edge locations than availability zones.
A. There are more edge locations than availability zones.
B. There are fewer regions than edge locations.
D. Each availability zone has a corresponding edge location.
answers: A. There are more edge locations than availability zones.
B. There are fewer regions than edge locations.
